|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 320 |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3206E; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM639165TS-6G; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:E0:4B |oui = 00:E0:4B |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = schematics |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = JCG-XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^JCG-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Shenzhen Yichen Technology |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (Was) |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/09/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00AKNMLQI |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== FCC photos show the device with a RT3050, FCC schematics show the device with an RT3052. :The FCC manual states antenna 1 is for RX only, so the device probably does indeed use RT3050. Default settings are per the FCC label. :The default SSID pattern appears to be '''JCG-XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the BSSID (upper case letters). Per the FCC documents (and supporting WiGLE data), the 00:E0:4B OUI is presumed to be used. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/jcg-jhr-n805r-150mbps-intelligent-vertical-wireless-2572 On '''SpeedGuide'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/jcg/jcg_jhr-n805r |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/jcg/jhr-n805r |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz] |comment = Image build disabled in master with commit d7d46da938e3
Image too big: snapshot }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== ====JTAG Pinouts==== On SMD resistors: R21 (TDO), R23 (TMS), R22 (TDI), R24 (TCLK), R27 (TRST) ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== VCC, TX, GND, RX [[Category:English Documentation]]
